name: Tyrunt

passive.name: Ancient Power
passive.effect: You may play Tyrunt from your hand as a Basic Pokemon. If you do, place 4 damage counters on it.

attacks.name: Dragon Rage
attacks.effect: Ignore weakness and resistance for this attack.

attacks.name: Temper Tantrum
attacks.effect: If Tyrunt has 4 or fewer damage counters on it, this attack does nothing.

flavor: These dragons eventually evolved into many of the dragon Pokemon we know today.
